review: No complicated mumbo jumbo- plug it in, select the name and the wireless network and with a few taps on the tablet, the chromecast is all set up and ready to stream to the TV.  Right now its only YouTube that streams ( Since I am not in the US), hulu and netflix are not available outside the US, but I see google adding more apps that could use this device. Great price too
author: Sunny "Sunny"

review: Perfect for watching online content on my TV.  I love that it has CEC support and will turn on the TV and change inputs when I cast something from my smartphone or laptop.  I hope to see more functionality and apps added in the future, like for instance the ability to cast the photos or videos on my smartphone to the TV, but given that this device only costs $35 and adds smart features to my otherwise dumb TV it definitely deserves 5 stars.
